source.name: ERC-20 Token Applications
source.instructions: Which of the following are valid applications of ERC-20 tokens? Select all that apply.

answers.answer: Creating a decentralized stablecoin pegged to the US dollar
Implementing a governance token for a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO)
Minting a unique digital artwork as a collectible
Developing a utility token for accessing specific platform services
Tokenizing fractional ownership of a specific real estate property

source.guidance: This question assesses understanding of ERC-20 token applications. ERC-20 tokens are fungible and suitable for use cases where tokens need to be interchangeable and divisible. Stablecoins, governance tokens, and utility tokens are common ERC-20 applications as they require fungibility. Unique digital artworks are typically non-fungible tokens (NFTs) and use different standards like ERC-721. Tokenizing specific real estate properties also usually involves non-fungible tokens, as each property is unique. Understanding these distinctions is crucial for identifying appropriate use cases for ERC-20 tokens in blockchain ecosystems.
source.learningObjectives: SWBAT evaluate and distinguish appropriate use cases for ERC-20 tokens in blockchain ecosystems
